  "title": "Customer Experience Specialist",
  "description": "New Age Mobile Concepts Limited was incorporated on August 1, 2008. is a brand for mobile phone charger. We offer not just phone chargers, but a brand that is known with innovation, consistency, panache; adopting modern and world-class technology that fits the users&#39; fashion and convenience. For several years, we have been Nigeria&rsquo;s foremost dealer in Mobile Phone Chargers. is a highly customer-centric company, obsessed with finding innovative ways to improve every customer&#39;s experience. This is built upon our easy-to-use products, skilled Customer Service Personnel and Sales Ambassadors.


We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Experience Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time



Job Objective


	To design and deliver exceptional customer journeys that strengthen brand loyalty and drive repeat business.
	The Customer Experience Specialist collaborates with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams to capture customer feedback, resolve issues, and implement service improvements.
	The role ensures consistent service standards across all touchpoints, analyzes customer insights to enhance satisfaction, and develops initiatives that increase retention, advocacy, and overall revenue growth in line with company objectives.


Core Functions


	Design and implement customer experience strategies that enhance satisfaction, loyalty, and lifetime value across all service channels.
	Monitor and map the customer journey, identifying pain points and opportunities to improve every stage of the interaction.
	Collect and analyze customer feedback through surveys, social media, NPS/CSAT data, and direct conversations to inform service improvements.
	Collaborate with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams to ensure a seamless, consistent brand experience from pre-purchase to post-purchase.
	Oversee issue resolution and service recovery, ensuring timely follow-up and root-cause analysis to prevent recurrence.
	Develop and deliver training programs that equip frontline staff with communication, empathy, and problem-solving skills.
	Prepare and present regular reports on customer satisfaction, retention rates, and key performance indicators to guide strategic decisions.
	Implement and optimize CRM or customer-service platforms to track interactions, manage cases, and share insights across departments.
	Partner with product and marketing teams to translate customer insights into product enhancements, messaging adjustments, and targeted campaigns.
	Champion a customer-centric culture, advocating for policies and processes that prioritize customer needs and long-term relationships.
	Evaluate and recommend technology solutions such as chatbots, self-service tools, or omnichannel support systems to improve efficiency and accessibility.
	Stay informed on industry trends and competitor practices, ensuring the company&rsquo;s service standards remain innovative and competitive.


Key Performance Indicator


	Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT): Average customer rating of service interactions.
	Net Promoter Score (NPS): Percentage of customers likely to recommend the brand.
	First Contact Resolution: Percentage of issues resolved during the first interaction.
	Average Resolution Time: Average time taken to close customer inquiries or complaints.
	Customer Retention Rate: Percentage of customers who continue doing business over a set period.
	Customer Effort Score (CES): Measure of how easy it is for customers to get their issues resolved.
	Response Time: Average time to respond to customer inquiries across all channels.
	Feedback Implementation Rate: Percentage of actionable customer insights adopted into processes or products.
	Service Level Agreement (SLA) Compliance: Percentage of interactions handled within agreed service timelines.
	Cross-Functional Collaboration Efficiency: Quality and timeliness of coordination with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Experience: 2&ndash;4 years in customer experience, service, or a similar customer-facing role.
	Skills: Excellent communication, problem-solving, and data analysis; strong knowledge of CRM tools and customer-satisfaction metrics (NPS/CSAT).
	Competencies: Collaborative, detail-oriented, and able to manage projects across teams.
	Attributes: High emotional intelligence, customer-centric mindset, and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.


Skills:


	Deep understanding of customer experience principles, journey mapping, and service recovery.
	Proficient with CRM platforms, customer-feedback tools, and data analysis (Excel or similar).
	Excellent communication, empathy, and relationship-building abilities across all customer touchpoints.
	Skilled at interpreting NPS/CSAT metrics and customer insights to drive retention and loyalty.
	Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills to handle escalations quickly and professionally.
	Able to collaborate with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams in a fast-paced environment.
	Highly organized with keen attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

        New Age Mobile Concepts Limited was incorporated on August 1, 2008. is a brand for mobile phone charger. We offer not just phone chargers, but a brand that is known with innovation, consistency, panache; adopting modern and world-class technology that fits the users' fashion and convenience. For several years, we have been Nigeria’s foremost dealer in Mobile Phone Chargers. is a highly customer-centric company, obsessed with finding innovative ways to improve every customer's experience. This is built upon our easy-to-use products, skilled Customer Service Personnel and Sales Ambassadors.
     

            
    




We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Experience Specialist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time



Job Objective


	To design and deliver exceptional customer journeys that strengthen brand loyalty and drive repeat business.
	The Customer Experience Specialist collaborates with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams to capture customer feedback, resolve issues, and implement service improvements.
	The role ensures consistent service standards across all touchpoints, analyzes customer insights to enhance satisfaction, and develops initiatives that increase retention, advocacy, and overall revenue growth in line with company objectives.


Core Functions


	Design and implement customer experience strategies that enhance satisfaction, loyalty, and lifetime value across all service channels.
	Monitor and map the customer journey, identifying pain points and opportunities to improve every stage of the interaction.
	Collect and analyze customer feedback through surveys, social media, NPS/CSAT data, and direct conversations to inform service improvements.
	Collaborate with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams to ensure a seamless, consistent brand experience from pre-purchase to post-purchase.
	Oversee issue resolution and service recovery, ensuring timely follow-up and root-cause analysis to prevent recurrence.
	Develop and deliver training programs that equip frontline staff with communication, empathy, and problem-solving skills.
	Prepare and present regular reports on customer satisfaction, retention rates, and key performance indicators to guide strategic decisions.
	Implement and optimize CRM or customer-service platforms to track interactions, manage cases, and share insights across departments.
	Partner with product and marketing teams to translate customer insights into product enhancements, messaging adjustments, and targeted campaigns.
	Champion a customer-centric culture, advocating for policies and processes that prioritize customer needs and long-term relationships.
	Evaluate and recommend technology solutions such as chatbots, self-service tools, or omnichannel support systems to improve efficiency and accessibility.
	Stay informed on industry trends and competitor practices, ensuring the company’s service standards remain innovative and competitive.


Key Performance Indicator


	Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT): Average customer rating of service interactions.
	Net Promoter Score (NPS): Percentage of customers likely to recommend the brand.
	First Contact Resolution: Percentage of issues resolved during the first interaction.
	Average Resolution Time: Average time taken to close customer inquiries or complaints.
	Customer Retention Rate: Percentage of customers who continue doing business over a set period.
	Customer Effort Score (CES): Measure of how easy it is for customers to get their issues resolved.
	Response Time: Average time to respond to customer inquiries across all channels.
	Feedback Implementation Rate: Percentage of actionable customer insights adopted into processes or products.
	Service Level Agreement (SLA) Compliance: Percentage of interactions handled within agreed service timelines.
	Cross-Functional Collaboration Efficiency: Quality and timeliness of coordination with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Experience: 2–4 years in customer experience, service, or a similar customer-facing role.
	Skills: Excellent communication, problem-solving, and data analysis; strong knowledge of CRM tools and customer-satisfaction metrics (NPS/CSAT).
	Competencies: Collaborative, detail-oriented, and able to manage projects across teams.
	Attributes: High emotional intelligence, customer-centric mindset, and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.


Skills:


	Deep understanding of customer experience principles, journey mapping, and service recovery.
	Proficient with CRM platforms, customer-feedback tools, and data analysis (Excel or similar).
	Excellent communication, empathy, and relationship-building abilities across all customer touchpoints.
	Skilled at interpreting NPS/CSAT metrics and customer insights to drive retention and loyalty.
	Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills to handle escalations quickly and professionally.
	Able to collaborate with sales, marketing, product, and operations teams in a fast-paced environment.
	Highly organized with keen attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

	The Executive Assistant will oversee the efficient functioning of office operations, procurement, training academy activities, marketing coordination, and HR responsibilities.

Administrative Duties:


	Provide general administrative and clerical support (scheduling, calls, documentation, etc.).
	Attend meetings and prepare minutes.
	Coordinate visa and travel arrangements (visa processing, ticketing, hotel reservations, accommodation).

	Request quotations from suppliers for the purchase of goods, services, and supplies.

	Verify suppliers&rsquo; invoices for accuracy against purchase orders.
	Monitor billing, subscriptions, and renewals.

	Coordinate events (workshops, seminars, webinars).

	Support marketing team in preparing promotional materials and using social media platforms to promote training programs.

	Conduct market research on training academies, trends, and opportunities.
	Support marketing initiatives and campaigns through:
	Assisting in event execution (launches, webinars, trade fairs).
	Handling logistics, including venue setup, Zoom webinar setup, and mailing lists.
	Coordinating with agencies and event organiser for marketing materials and logistics.

	Education: University degree in Business Administration, Business Law, or equivalent.
	Experience: 5&ndash;7 years in a relevant field.
	Languages: Fluent in English (speaking, reading, writing).
	Technology: Proficient with MS Office, LinkedIn, and social media platforms.


Key Competencies:


	Fast learner, team player, proactive, adaptable, highly organised, excellent time management and multitasking skills, problem-solving ability, strong communication, reliable, detail-oriented, discreet, and professional.

Executive Assistant Job at SHELT




        
    

        
        SHELT protects your business by providing a 24/7 Security Operations Center (SOC) with centralized dedicated security consultants . We offer online and cloud based security services to trusted global clients through a cybersecurity-as-a-service partnership model that is designed to sustainably and effectively shelter your company from data theft and cyber threats. With a comprehensive offering of solutions, and an excellent on-the-ground network across Europe and Africa, Shelt is looking to become the preferred choice for cybersecurity-as-a-service provider in the entire region.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lagos
     

            
    



Job Summary


	The Executive Assistant will oversee the efficient functioning of office operations, procurement, training academy activities, marketing coordination, and HR responsibilities.
	The ideal candidate should be proactive, highly organised, detail-oriented, and capable of managing multiple responsibilities in a dynamic environment.


Duties & Responsibilities
Administrative Duties:


	Provide general administrative and clerical support (scheduling, calls, documentation, etc.).
	Attend meetings and prepare minutes.
	Coordinate visa and travel arrangements (visa processing, ticketing, hotel reservations, accommodation).
	Coordinate with express couriers and mail service companies.
	Maintain proper filing systems (both electronic and hard copies).
	Manage office supplies and oversee office maintenance needs.


Procurement and Basic Accounting:


	Request quotations from suppliers for the purchase of goods, services, and supplies.
	Issue purchase orders to suppliers and ensure timely fulfilment.
	Verify suppliers’ invoices for accuracy against purchase orders.
	Monitor billing, subscriptions, and renewals.
	Support basic invoicing and collection follow-up.


Training Academy Activities:


	Coordinate events (workshops, seminars, webinars).
	Collect and analyse feedback to improve training program quality.
	Support marketing team in preparing promotional materials and using social media platforms to promote training programs.


Marketing Coordination / Social Media Activities:


	Conduct market research on training academies, trends, and opportunities.
	Support marketing initiatives and campaigns through:
	Assisting in event execution (launches, webinars, trade fairs).
	Handling logistics, including venue setup, Zoom webinar setup, and mailing lists.
	Coordinating with agencies and event organiser for marketing materials and logistics.


HR / Personnel Duties:


	Collect and organise CVs from various sources, while continuously updating the HR Manager on additional recruitment channels and resources.
	Screening CVs against role requirements.
	Scheduling interviews with selected candidates in coordination with the HRM and hiring managers.
	Assist in recruitment, orientation, onboarding, and offboarding procedures.
	Ensure new employees are equipped with laptops and tools before joining.
	Handle proper documentation
	Organise and coordinate training activities, with a focus on soft skills topics (e.g., communication, teamwork, problem-solving, leadership), in collaboration with the HR Manager at Headquarters.
	Act as the point of contact for HR-related matters in Nigeria, escalating issues or observations to the Country Manager and HR Manager at Headquarters.
	Stay up to date with Nigerian labor laws and HR regulations and regularly update the Country Manager and HR Manager in Lebanon on changes that may affect company policies and employee relations.


Skills and Qualifications


	Education: University degree in Business Administration, Business Law, or equivalent.
	Experience: 5–7 years in a relevant field.
	Languages: Fluent in English (speaking, reading, writing).
	Technology: Proficient with MS Office, LinkedIn, and social media platforms.


Key Competencies:


	Fast learner, team player, proactive, adaptable, highly organised, excellent time management and multitasking skills, problem-solving ability, strong communication, reliable, detail-oriented, discreet, and professional.

Carbon has operations in Ghana, Kenya, and Nigeria, supported by a talented team spread between Lagos, Nairobi, London, Argentina, and Palo Alto so we operate with a remote-first mindset.&nbsp;

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Senior Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

About the Role


	We are looking for an experienced and highly motivated Senior Accountant to join our finance team. This is a critical role responsible for overseeing core accounting functions, driving financial strategy, and providing key insights to support our rapid growth.
	The ideal candidate will be a proactive leader with deep expertise in financial reporting and a proven ability to optimize processes in a dynamic fintech environment.


Responsibilities


	Financial Reporting &amp; Strategic Analysis: Lead the end-to-end preparation of accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements. Conduct advanced financial analysis to identify trends, forecast future performance, and provide strategic recommendations to senior leadership.
	Regulatory Reporting: Lead the Preparation of all Regulatory Reports to CBN, NDIC and ensure Reports are submitted within required timelines monthly.
	IFRS 9 Compliance &amp; Impairment Modeling: Lead the implementation and ongoing compliance with IFRS 9 standards, particularly in relation to Expected Credit Loss (ECL) provisioning. Work closely with credit risk and data teams to ensure that loan impairment models reflect appropriate staging, probability of default, loss given default, and exposure at default. Ensure impairment results are accurately posted to the general ledger and reflected in financial reports.
	Transaction Processing and Postings: Oversee Payments for different purposes and record Transactions correctly in appropriate General ledger in the Accounting Software used.
	Statutory payments: Oversee all Statutory Payments and ensure relevant timelines are maintained monthly.
	Bank Reconciliation: Oversee the Preparation of all bank reconciliations Monthly
	Transaction Reconciliation &amp; Oversight: Oversee the daily reconciliation of all payment platforms, including NIBSS, MIFOS, Paystack, and other payment gateways. Manage complex reconciliation discrepancies and implement new protocols to ensure accuracy and efficiency at scale.
	Audit Management: Lead and manage the external audit process, ensuring timely coordination with auditors and completion ahead of regulatory deadlines.
	Tax Management and Compliance: Work with Tax Consultant to ensure Tax Compliance and ensure necessary remittances are made as and when due.
	Team Leadership &amp; Mentorship: Provide guidance, training, and mentorship to junior accountants. Foster a culture of excellence and continuous improvement within the finance team.
	Cross-Functional Collaboration: Act as a strategic financial partner to a wide range of teams, including Operations, Technology, and Risk. Collaborate closely with C-suite executives to align financial processes with the company&rsquo;s strategic goals.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	A minimum of 5 years of progressive experience in accounting, with at least 2 years in a senior-level role within the fintech or financial services sector.
	A proven track record of handling complex financial transactions and leading process improvements. Deep expertise in payment systems, settlement processes, and financial reporting frameworks.
	A professional accounting certification (ACA, ACCA, CPA, ICAN) is a must.
	Exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills. Demonstrated ability to lead projects and mentor team members.
	Advanced knowledge of accounting software and financial management tools. Experience with core banking systems like Mifos is highly desirable.
	In-depth understanding of IFRS 9 and its practical application in a lending or financial services environment is highly desirable.
	Able to prepare financial statements from scratch to present a true and fair view of the company&rsquo;s performance.
	Outstanding interpersonal skills with a collaborative style of working.
	Self-starter, highly motivated and well-organised, with unquestionable integrity, good judgement and strong professional ethics.


Benefits


	A diverse team and upbeat work environment.
	Hybrid work schedule.
	Health Insurance.
	Life Insurance
	Career development &amp; Growth.


Recruitment Process


	Call with People Team
	Technical Assessment/Case Study

Senior Accountant Job at Carbon Nigeria




        
    

        
        Carbon is a pan-African digital bank with a mission to provide friction-free finance to its customers. Carbon promises to play a fundamental role in its customers’ lives wherever they are, with flexible solutions. We pride ourselves on our efficiency and with just $10mm of equity raised in 2015, we have disbursed over $100m in loans and earned more than $30mm in revenue over the last 2 years. Carbon has operations in Ghana, Kenya, and Nigeria, supported by a talented team spread between Lagos, Nairobi, London, Argentina, and Palo Alto so we operate with a remote-first mindset. 

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant

Job Location: Lagos
     

            
    



About the Role


	We are looking for an experienced and highly motivated Senior Accountant to join our finance team. This is a critical role responsible for overseeing core accounting functions, driving financial strategy, and providing key insights to support our rapid growth.
	The ideal candidate will be a proactive leader with deep expertise in financial reporting and a proven ability to optimize processes in a dynamic fintech environment.


Responsibilities


	Financial Reporting & Strategic Analysis: Lead the end-to-end preparation of accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements. Conduct advanced financial analysis to identify trends, forecast future performance, and provide strategic recommendations to senior leadership.
	Regulatory Reporting: Lead the Preparation of all Regulatory Reports to CBN, NDIC and ensure Reports are submitted within required timelines monthly.
	IFRS 9 Compliance & Impairment Modeling: Lead the implementation and ongoing compliance with IFRS 9 standards, particularly in relation to Expected Credit Loss (ECL) provisioning. Work closely with credit risk and data teams to ensure that loan impairment models reflect appropriate staging, probability of default, loss given default, and exposure at default. Ensure impairment results are accurately posted to the general ledger and reflected in financial reports.
	Transaction Processing and Postings: Oversee Payments for different purposes and record Transactions correctly in appropriate General ledger in the Accounting Software used.
	Statutory payments: Oversee all Statutory Payments and ensure relevant timelines are maintained monthly.
	Bank Reconciliation: Oversee the Preparation of all bank reconciliations Monthly
	Transaction Reconciliation & Oversight: Oversee the daily reconciliation of all payment platforms, including NIBSS, MIFOS, Paystack, and other payment gateways. Manage complex reconciliation discrepancies and implement new protocols to ensure accuracy and efficiency at scale.
	Audit Management: Lead and manage the external audit process, ensuring timely coordination with auditors and completion ahead of regulatory deadlines.
	Tax Management and Compliance: Work with Tax Consultant to ensure Tax Compliance and ensure necessary remittances are made as and when due.
	Team Leadership & Mentorship: Provide guidance, training, and mentorship to junior accountants. Foster a culture of excellence and continuous improvement within the finance team.
	Cross-Functional Collaboration: Act as a strategic financial partner to a wide range of teams, including Operations, Technology, and Risk. Collaborate closely with C-suite executives to align financial processes with the company’s strategic goals.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	A minimum of 5 years of progressive experience in accounting, with at least 2 years in a senior-level role within the fintech or financial services sector.
	A proven track record of handling complex financial transactions and leading process improvements. Deep expertise in payment systems, settlement processes, and financial reporting frameworks.
	A professional accounting certification (ACA, ACCA, CPA, ICAN) is a must.
	Exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills. Demonstrated ability to lead projects and mentor team members.
	Advanced knowledge of accounting software and financial management tools. Experience with core banking systems like Mifos is highly desirable.
	In-depth understanding of IFRS 9 and its practical application in a lending or financial services environment is highly desirable.
	Able to prepare financial statements from scratch to present a true and fair view of the company’s performance.
	Outstanding interpersonal skills with a collaborative style of working.
	Self-starter, highly motivated and well-organised, with unquestionable integrity, good judgement and strong professional ethics.


Benefits


	A diverse team and upbeat work environment.
	Hybrid work schedule.
	Health Insurance.
	Life Insurance
	Career development & Growth.


Recruitment Process


	Call with People Team
	Technical Assessment/Case Study
	Interview with MD.

General Manager Job at DreamCity Property & Investment Limited




        
    

        
        DreamCity Property & Investment Limited remains at the vanguard of residential and commercial real estate development across major cities in Nigeria delivering reliable structures with qualified infrastructure, luxury apartments in highbrow cities, and commercial real estate with good returns for our investors, who have over time become part of our success story.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time (Onsite)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Are you an accomplished professional with a wealth of experience in administration, HR, marketing, business development, construction site supervision, and real estate management?
	Are you ready to take the lead and drive success in the ever-evolving world of real estate and property construction? If so, we have a fantastic opportunity for you!
	At DreamCity Group, a leading real estate and property construction company, we are seeking a highly skilled and motivated General Manager to oversee our operations, drive growth, and ensure excellence in all aspects of our business.
	We are looking for an individual with at least 7 years of experience in the industry and a strong track record of success.


Responsibilities


	Oversee administration, HR, Sales, marketing, business development, construction site supervision, and real estate management functions.
	Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and partners to drive target sales results, business growth and secure new opportunities.
	Sales strategy development, lead generation and management, sales forecasting and reporting and sales targets achievement
	Monitor and analyze market trends, identify new market segments, and develop innovative strategies to expand our business footprint.
	Ensure exceptional project execution by overseeing construction site supervision, quality control, and adherence to timelines and budgets.
	Lead and inspire a high-performing team, fostering a culture of team work collaboration, growth, and excellence and operational efficiency
	Oversee financial management, including budgeting, forecasting, and cost control measures to achieve profitability targets.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards in all aspects of our operations.


Requirements


	Relevant educational qualifications in Business Administration, Construction Management, Sales & Marketing Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 7 years of experience in administration, HR, sales, marketing, business development, construction site supervision, and real estate management in the real estate and property construction industry.
	Proven track record of success in driving business growth, securing new clients, and expanding market presence.
	Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate teams to achieve exceptional results.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	In-depth knowledge of the real estate and property construction industry, including market trends, regulations, and best practices.
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage projects effectively in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: recruitment.office@dreamcityproperty.com using the Job Position and Job Location as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further selection stages.
